name: Dragondodo - Jewel Paradise
description:
Adventure with the bear in this gem world. The bear loves gems, especially some brilliant gems. Matching gems of the same color can cause unexpected things. During the exploration process, the bears will meet other animal friends, and they will give the bear a special gem task.Find the same color gems and get the stars together with the dragon baby.

Features:
More than 500 levels and updates will be continued!
Easy to play, challenge mastery!
Play anytime, anywhere, no wi-fi can play!

You will love this game, Download and play now!
developers: Hong Hai Wu Xian Technology Development Co
publishers: Beijing Hong Hai Wu Xian Technology Development Co
